org.openbase.bco.ontology.lib.system.config

Class OntConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openbase.bco.ontology.lib.system.config.OntConfig

  • public final class OntConfig
extends Object
    This java class configures the ontology-system and set different elements like namespace or superclasses of the ontology. Furthermore a method tests the validity of them (e.g. spelling mistakes) to roll an ExceptionHandling part out of the ontology-processing.
    Author:
    agatting on 14.11.16.

      • decimalFormat

      • initialTestConfig

        public void initialTestConfig()
                       throws InterruptedException,
                              org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Method tests the ontology elements of the configuration class (valid - e.g. no spelling mistake). Errors are printed via ExceptionPrinter.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - Exception is thrown, if the stopwatch is interrupted.
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - NotAvailableException
